objects.text: Advanced Heat Pump Technology • Multiple Drying Cycles • Smart Controls

product_details.name: Insignia™ Modern Smart Heat Pump Dryer - Energy-Efficient Fabric Care
product_details.description:
• Advanced Digital Display with LED Screen for Easy Operation
• Multiple Drying Cycles Including My Cycle, Mixed Load, Heavy Duty & Delicates
• Energy-Efficient Heat Pump Technology for Cost Savings
• Sleek White Design with Modern Black Glass Door
• Large Capacity Drum for Family-Sized Loads
• Smart Temperature Control with Multiple Heat Settings
• Convenient Maintenance Access Panel
• Built-in Ventilation System
• User-Friendly Control Dial with Multiple Program Options
• Compact Yet Powerful Design Perfect for Any Laundry Space
• Clear Digital Timer Display for Cycle Monitoring
• Wrinkle Prevention Feature Available
• Easy-Access Lint Filter for Simple Maintenance

banner_details:
The banner features a sleek and modern promotional design for a home appliance. It contains a clean, gradient blue background accented with large, semi-transparent geometric circles and a dotted grid pattern for a subtle high-tech feel. Centered is a detailed product image showcasing the appliance. At the top, a prominent text layer (id: "heading") introduces the product name, followed by a bold tagline layer (id: "subheading") emphasizing its energy-efficient capabilities. Below the product, another descriptive line (id: "description") lists features in a compact format. A motivational phrase (id: "tagline") is positioned above a bold price tag (id: "price"), and a call-to-action button (id: "cta_button") with overlaying text (id: "cta") drives engagement. 

**Color Palette:**  
- Light Sky Blue Gradient: `#E6F4F9` to `#C5E8F0`  
- Deep Teal Blue: `#1A6B8F`  
- Soft Ocean Blue: `#3D8CA7`  
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a modern front-load dryer with a sleek and minimalistic design. The dominant color is a crisp White (#FFFFFF), creating a clean and contemporary aesthetic. It’s contrasted sharply by the Black (#000000) door and control panel, which add visual depth and focus. Accents such as the chrome ring around the dial incorporate a cool Silver Gray (#C0C0C0), while the control indicators use subtle Blue (#3AA6D0) and Red (#E94545) highlights for function categorization. The colors blend seamlessly for functional clarity, while contrast ensures highlight areas—like the display screen—remain prominent. This palette is ideal for a tech-focused, modern advertisement banner.
